modName: Bioshock Wrench and power mod (early stages)
summary: The Wrench from bioshock, my favorite weapon, I tried to keep it as like it as I could, even the way it smashes enemies back, with a hint of shock, now that the wrench is done I am working on the powers fro the mod.
descriptionHtml:
Leave me a comment on what you want to be added :)

Changes-
Can now get eve syringes that will boost your magic. Still a slight texture bug

Added a spell electro bolt, this is obtained by finding the little syringe of adam next to jacks body, it will give you the power.
Fixed the blood on the wrench glitch, the blood works fine now :)

bugs-

The eletro bolt power went green on me and i cant get it back to to look like electricity.
Texture bug on the syringe


After watching an episode of Top 5 skyrim mods of the week Seb mentions how there is not really any bioshock mods out there, so I did a check and got the idea to make this one.
-
The wrench will knock back anyone that tries to attack you so it is fairly op.
-
This is of course the first mod I am uploading so plenty of feedback would be great :)
-
If people are interested in it I might keep going with it, if I do continue it in the future there will be different variations of the weapon, like poison or fire, to give it a bioshock feel of the powers, the different variations will have different textures to correspond with them, I will also upgrade the texture and the model if it comes to it.
-
If this ever gets mentioned on top 5 skyrim mods tweet me to let me know because that would just complete my life.
https://twitter.com/BroTechGames
-

This mod does not require any additional mods or dlc, right now it is simple but if it receives interest I will consider making it better.
author: CactusKnight

files.name: Bioshock Wrench and power mod v5
